jobs.title: Senior React Developer
jobs.description: We are seeking a talented Front-End Developer to join our team in Nairobi, Kenya. The ideal candidate will have strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with experience working with modern JavaScript frameworks such as React or Angular.

company.name: NewTek Kenya
company.description: NewTek Kenya is a leading technology company specializing in web development and digital solutions. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality products and services to our clients while fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.

jobs.title: Front-End Engineer (React & Redux)
jobs.description: Join our team as a Front-End Developer in coastal Mombasa. We are looking for a motivated individual with a passion for crafting beautiful and responsive web applications. Experience with UI/UX design principles and a strong attention to detail are highly desirable.

company.name: Veneer Solutions KE
company.description: Veneer Solutions KE is a creative agency specializing in digital design and development. Our team is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of creativity and innovation to deliver exceptional results for our clients.

jobs.title: React.js Developer
jobs.description: Are you passionate about front-end development? Join our team in vibrant Nakuru, working on exciting projects that make a difference. We offer competitive compensation and a collaborative work environment where your ideas are valued.

company.name: Dolor Cloud KE
company.description: Dolor Cloud KE is a leading technology company specializing in digital solutions for businesses of all sizes. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, we are committed to delivering cutting-edge products and services.

jobs.title: React Front-End Developer (Part-Time)
jobs.description: Join our team as a Part-Time Front-End Developer in Nairobi with flexible hours and the option to work remotely. We are looking for a self-motivated individual with a passion for creating engaging user experiences.

jobs.title: Full Stack React Developer
jobs.description: Exciting opportunity for a Full-Time Front-End Developer in Nairobi. We are seeking a talented individual with a passion for building elegant and scalable web applications. Join our team and make an impact!

jobs.title: React Native Developer
jobs.description: Join our team as a Front-End Developer in Kisumu, Kenya. We are looking for a skilled and enthusiastic individual to help us create innovative web and mobile solutions. Competitive salary and benefits package available.
